snippet: Michele Lee, a Broadway veteran also known for playing Karen in the long-running nighttime soap opera “Knots Landing,” had stamina to burn during a three-night stint at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Michele Lee, a Broadway veteran also known for playing Karen in the long-running nighttime soap opera “Knots Landing,” had stamina to burn during a three-night stint at 54 Below.

headline.seo: Cabaret Stint for Michele Lee at 54 Below
headline.main: Ballads With a Big Dose of Melodrama
